public class auth

extends lucee.Component

Controller to handle all things related to authentication

Method Detail

checkAuth

remote any checkAuth()
Checks to see if the current session user is authorized. If so, returns the current user

getCurrentUser

package struct getCurrentUser()
Returns the currently logged in user

isLoggedIn

package boolean isLoggedIn()
checks if the current session is logged in

login

remote any login([string email], [string password])
Logs a user into the control panel based on the passed email and password. Returns the message to be displayed to the user if no email/password combination is found. NOTE: For the function handling login to the app itself, see user.login

Parameters:
email
password

logout

remote any logout()
Logs out the current user.

setCurrentUser

Sets the user variable in the session scope
